base_description: Rectangular, black and silver dishwasher, medium-sized.
part_description: Front silver door with handle, black body, rectangular shape. Door covers the entire front and hinges at the bottom.
internal_interaction_description: The door hinges allow it to open downward, providing access to the interior racks. The handle facilitates easy opening and closing. The door seals tightly against the body to prevent water leakage during operation.
external_interaction_description: Connects to water and power supply for operation. Users interact through the front door to load and unload dishes. The dishwasher fits under countertops, integrating into kitchen cabinetry.
